feed.title: Manyfold Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.66.0
entry.content:
On the surface, this release is mostly about more accessibility - keyboard controls for rotating 3d models, correctly-tagged languages, and colour contrast. But in order to do that, behind the scenes the 3d renderer has had a massive rewrite, and I hope you'll find it a lot faster and smoother to use!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Enable keyboard control for 3d canvases by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2163
  • Improved keyboard controls for 3d views by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2165

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Remove enforced strict loading in dev by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2159
  • Pass worker URL in as an attribute to avoid path problems by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2161

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Allow Manyfold to be in a same origin frame by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2153
  • Use Logstash JSON output format for production logs by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2154
  • Move 3d rendering to a background web worker by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2152
  • update xmldom to current version (via 3mf loader package) by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2160
  • Set 'lang' attribute on untranslated strings by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2162
  • Add health endpoint for uptime monitoring by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2164
  • Improve colour contrast for problem list by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2167

New Contributors

  • @matthewbadeau made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2164

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.65.0...v0.66.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.66.2
entry.content:
Small hotfix to stop invalid filenames being created during 3MF export.

What's Changed

üêõ Bug Fixes üêõ

  • Fix invalid filenames in 3MF export by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2173

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.66.1...v0.66.2

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.67.0
entry.content:
This release introduces optional, anonymous, as-private-as-possible usage tracking, purely so that we can answer the question "how many people are using Manyfold?". There is a detailed breakdown of exactly what data is collected and how we use it in the admin manual, but in summary, we collect only the application version you're running, and we can't access or save it, other than getting aggregated statistics.

Privacy is super important to us, so we've put a lot of work in to make this as difficult for ourselves as possible! And of course, it's completely optional and off by default, so you can choose whether or not you want to report in.

Having said all that, letting us know is super useful, so if you're comfortable doing so, please please turn on the reporting in settings! ‚ù§Ô∏è

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Anonymous OPT-IN usage tracking by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2183

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Removes account deletion box in single-user mode by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2175
  • Adds .well-known URI for password change by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2174
  • Don't schedule background usage reporting job if not enabled by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2188

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.66.2...v0.67.0

entry.title: New release for Manyfold: v0.68.0
entry.content:
A small release this week, while we do some more big changes behind the scenes for a future release. Main thing is an improvement to the automatic grouping of files in models, so that they get arranged in a more sensible way. There's more to improve here, but this should make things a bit more useful!

What's Changed

‚ú® New Features ‚ú®

  • Improve automatic part grouping in models by @Floppy in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2211

üõ†Ô∏è Other Improvements üõ†Ô∏è

  • Add target="_blank" to footer links by @chryton in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2200
  • Adding app version as an attribute by @matthewbadeau in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2194

New Contributors

  • @chryton made their first contribution in https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/pull/2200

Full Changelog: https://github.com/manyfold3d/manyfold/compare/v0.67.0...v0.68.0
